Export.Routine: WWWWHRX #include COMSYS ;/------------------------------------------------------------------\ ;| Description of Function : ;| EDIT FOREIGN CURRENCY ;| ;| Inputs : ;| ;| ;| ByRef : ;| ;| ;| Returns : ;| ;| ;| History : ;| 30-May-2005 RobertW SR12056: Attempt at Performance Increase ;| FIS 22.06.2004 ;| ;\------------------------------------------------------------------/ SET ;LOAD EXISTING VALUE new YLFDATX,YLFN,YFORM,YSATZ,YVALUE,YI,PYVALUE,PYCHAR set YART="" set YKEY=$get(YKEY) set YFORM=$get(YFORM) set YLFDAT=$get(%(YQUERY,"YLFDAT")) ;FIELD set YFORM=$get(%(YQUERY,"YLFFORM")) ;FORM ;shape if $get(%(YQUERY,"YHTMFORM1"))'="" set YHTMFORM=$get(%(YQUERY,"YHTMFORM1")) ;INPUT FORM ;shape set YLFDATX=$reverse(YLFDAT) for YI=1:1 set YART=$extract(YLFDATX,YI) set YLFN=$extract(YLFDATX,1,YI) quit:+YART=0&(YART'=0) ;M,D ODER P set YLFN=$extract($reverse($get(YLFN)),2,99) if +YLFN=0 quit if YART'="D" if YART'="M" if YART'="P" quit ;SET YSATZ="^WWWDATEN("_""""_YM_""""_","_+$HOROLOG_","_YUSER_","_""""_YFORM_""""_","_""""_YART_""""_",1)" set YVALUE=$piece($get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,YART,1)),Y,YLFN) set YFELD="" set $piece(YFELD,Y,1)="" ;FOR YI=1:1 QUIT:$EXTRACT($PIECE(YVALUE,"@",2),YI)=""!($EXTRACT($PIECE(YVALUE,"@",2),YI)=0)!(+$EXTRACT($PIECE(YVALUE,"@",2),YI)'=0) SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,1)=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,1)_$EXTRACT($PIECE(YVALUE,"@",2),YI) set PYVALUE=$piece(YVALUE,"@",2) ; 12-Apr-2005 RobertW SR12053: Store this and use it instead of calling it 5 or 6 times per loop ; 12-Apr-2005 RobertW SR12053: In the next line we must check for a USD.1, so if we find a dot, we use that as a break as well. use YDECIMAL instead of ., use . as the default if YDECIMAL is not set. ;FOR YI=1:1 QUIT:$EXTRACT(PYVALUE,YI)=""!($EXTRACT(PYVALUE,YI)="-")!($EXTRACT(PYVALUE,YI)=0)!(+$EXTRACT(PYVALUE,YI)'=0)!($EXTRACT(PYVALUE,YI)=$get(YDECIMAL,".")) SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,1)=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,1)_$EXTRACT(PYVALUE,YI) ; 27-Apr-2005 PO Again, more efficient as only using extract once per loop for YI=1:1 set PYCHAR=$extract(PYVALUE,YI) quit:PYCHAR=""!(PYCHAR="-")!(PYCHAR=0)!(+PYCHAR'=0)!(PYCHAR=$get(YDECIMAL,".")) set $piece(YFELD,Y,1)=$piece(YFELD,Y,1)_PYCHAR ;FIS;MINUSBETRÄGE;27024;21.12.04 set $piece(YFELD,Y,2)=$extract($piece(YVALUE,"@",2),YI,99) set $piece(YFELD,Y,3)=$piece(YVALUE,"@",3) set $piece(YFELD,Y,4)=$piece(YVALUE,"@",1) quit CALC(YINHALT,YLFDAT) ; Calculate base amount ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Calculate base amount etc. ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: full base number ; ; History: ; 06-Jan-2011 GRF SR17579: Use explicit tag ; 27-Oct-2005 JW SR13074: Rewritten for exchange rate type ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new YVALUE,YMFELD set YMFELD=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"M",1)) set YVALUE=$piece(YMFELD,Y,1)_$piece(YMFELD,Y,2) ;USD22,00 if $piece(YMFELD,Y,3)'="" set YVALUE=YVALUE_"@"_$piece(YMFELD,Y,3) set YVALUE=$$GetInternal^WWWTR(8,YVALUE) // Calculate base set %TXT(1)="#Y"_YFORM_"M4~"_$$GetLiteral^WWWTR(8,YVALUE) if $piece(YMFELD,Y,3)="" { set %TXT(1)=%TXT(1)_"#Y"_YFORM_"M3~"_$$GetLiteral^WWWTR(18,$piece(YVALUE,"@",3)) } if $get(YLFN) = 1 { if $piece(YFELD,Y,1)'="" set %TXT(1)=%TXT(1)_"#DUMMYM1~"_$piece($get(^WWW100(0,"WAEHRUNG",SPRACHE,$piece(YFELD,Y,1),1)),Y,1) } quit YVALUE SAVE ;SAVE CHANGES ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; History: ; 27-Oct-2005 JW SR13074: Use EventValue to get stored not displayed values ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- write YCR write YCR,"" write YCR,"" write YCR,"" quit
